address: Xã Tân Thắng, Huyện Quỳnh Lưu, Tỉnh Nghệ An
thought:
**Navigating the Reorganization of Nghệ An Province: Identifying the New Ward for "Xã Tân Thắng"**

Okay, here's how I'm approaching this. I've been presented with the task of pinpointing the new administrative unit (ward) for the old address "Xã Tân Thắng, Huyện Quỳnh Lưu, Tỉnh Nghệ An". My initial step, as always, is to deconstruct the address and understand the key components. I need to identify the relevant old ward ("Xã Tân Thắng"), the old district ("Huyện Quỳnh Lưu", though this is less crucial in this context, it will help in finding the correct resolution), and the province ("Tỉnh Nghệ An").

My next step is to consult the relevant resolutions. I've been given some key resolutions, so I'll start there. I already know that I need to consult the resolutions related to Nghệ An, so I will filter to just those.

First, I always begin by checking if the province has been impacted. I review the list of provinces that are not subject to mergers (60-NQ/TW), and confirm that "Tỉnh Nghệ An" is indeed on that list, meaning no change at the province level. That's a good starting point. So the Province "Tỉnh Nghệ An" will remain unchanged.

Then, I'll dive into the specific resolutions for Nghệ An. I identified 1678/NQ-UBTVQH15 as relevant, so I’m focusing on that one now. I meticulously read through the resolution, particularly looking for any mentions of "Xã Tân Thắng" or any potential mergers or reorganizations affecting it.

Bingo! On line 77, I found it! The resolution states: "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Tân Thắng và xã Quỳnh Thắng thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Quỳnh Thắng**." This resolution is the key!  "Xã Tân Thắng" has been merged with "Xã Quỳnh Thắng" to form the new ward, which is named "Xã Quỳnh Thắng". The old district "Huyện Quỳnh Lưu" isn't mentioned after the merge.

Now, I cross-reference this information with the provided list of new wards to confirm my findings. I searched the provided "New wards" list for "Xã Quỳnh Thắng" within "Tỉnh Nghệ An", and I found a perfect match: `{"ward_code":"17224","ward_name":"Xã Quỳnh Thắng","province_name":"Tỉnh Nghệ An"}`.

Given that the resolution explicitly states the merge and I've found a corresponding new ward entry, my confidence in this result is "high".  This is further substantiated by the fact that the province, "Tỉnh Nghệ An", has not changed according to the 60-NQ/TW resolution. I'm now confident that the new ward for "Xã Tân Thắng" is "Xã Quỳnh Thắng" with the code "17224", which has been merged, citing the relevant legislation and line from that legislation.

citation.header: 1678/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Nghệ An
citation.line: 77. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Tân Thắng và xã Quỳnh Thắng thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Quỳnh Thắng.
